days.title: Day 1 Prayer
days.text:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Intro Prayer

Strengthen, O God, your Church in the sacraments of your grace, that we, in union with the teaching and prayers of your servant Cyril of Jerusalem, may enter more fully into your Paschal mystery, through Jesus Christ our Lord, who lives and reigns with you and the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.
Amen
St Cyril, dauntless defender and teacher of the Catholic Faith against heretics and pagans, obtain for us the graces we need from God to form our intellects in His truth, through Christ our Lord.
We also ask in particular for the intention of this novena (mention your request here…)
Amen.

Concluding Prayer

Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be
St Cyril of Jerusalem, pray for us!
